metadata.title: Twitter Viewer | Free X Viewer | Twitter Web Viewer
metadata.description: Twitter Viewer is the fast X viewer that lets you browse tweets, profiles, threads and trends without logging in. Discover the ultimate twitter web viewer for research, monitoring and inspiration.
metadata.keywords: Twitter Viewer, X viewer, twitter web viewer, Twitter profile viewer, anonymous Twitter viewer

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

blog.title: Twitter Viewer Blog
blog.description: Guides on X marketing, twitter web viewer workflows, and audience insights.
blog.author: Author

my_invites.title: My Invites
my_invites.invite_tip: Invite one friend to upgrade Twitter Viewer and earn $50 credit.
my_invites.no_orders: You can't invite others before you subscribe to Twitter Viewer.
my_invites.no_affiliates: You're not allowed to invite others, please contact us to apply for permission.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear what went well or how we can improve the product experience.
feedback.rating_tip: How do you feel about Twitter Viewer?

component_one.title: Dive into X without logging in
component_one.description: Twitter Viewer is the lightning-fast X viewer built for researchers, marketers, and fans.
component_one.subdescription: Load profiles, threads, hashtags and spaces inside a distraction-free twitter web viewer with real-time metrics.

control_panel.title: Lookup Workspace
control_panel.description: Drop @handles, tweet URLs or keywords to explore them inside Twitter Viewer analytics.
control_panel.file_types: Upload .csv or .txt lists up to 100 entries.
control_panel.prompt_description: Add filters for language, engagement or media type.
control_panel.prompt_placeholder: Example: track #AI videos from verified accounts this week
control_panel.aspect_ratio_description: Choose the layout for your twitter web viewer export
control_panel.output_count_description: Decide how many saved views to create

preview_carousel.title: Timeline Preview
preview_carousel.description: Instantly preview tweets, media and engagement before saving.

calculator.title: Twitter Viewer Analytics
calculator.description: Enter any two values below and Twitter Viewer estimates the third for you.
calculator.hero_description: Model tweet impressions, engagement rates and link clicks to optimise your X strategy.

cpm.title: Tweet Impression Estimator
cpm.description: Project tweet reach by combining spend or organic boosts with CPM benchmarks.

cpa.title: Follower Acquisition Calculator
cpa.description: Estimate cost per new follower from promoted tweets or campaigns.

ctr.title: Engagement Rate Calculator
ctr.description: Measure engagement on tweets and threads inside Twitter Viewer.
ctr.label: Engagement Rate
ctr.card_description: Calculate engagement rate, engagements or impressions.
ctr.clicks_description: Likes, replies, reposts and link clicks
ctr.cvr_card_description: Calculate conversion rate, conversions or clicks for your X landing pages.

roi.description: Understand return on investment for your Twitter Viewer campaigns.

cpm_data_selector.title: CPM Data Explorer
cpm_data_selector.description: Global CPM insights by country & industry

cpm_features.title: Powerful CPM Calculation Features
cpm_features.description: Everything you need to calculate, analyze, and optimize your digital advertising campaigns.

calculate.title: Precise Calculations
calculate.description: Calculate CPM, impressions, and total costs with professional accuracy for any advertising campaign.

optimize.title: Campaign Optimization
optimize.description: Find the optimal balance between cost and reach to maximize your advertising ROI.

analyze.title: Performance Analysis
analyze.description: Analyze your campaign performance with detailed metrics and insights for better decision making.

report.title: Detailed Reports
report.description: Generate comprehensive reports with all key metrics to share with stakeholders and clients.

cpm.title: Twitter Viewer Profile Insights
cpm.subtitle: Audit any public X profile
cpm.description: Review top tweets, engagement ratios and follower trends inside the Twitter Viewer without logging in.

cpc.title: Thread Reader for Long Tweets
cpc.subtitle: Expand, summarise and save
cpc.description: Turn complex threads into clean narratives, copy them with formatting or export as PDFs.

cpa.title: Real-time Hashtag Tracker
cpa.subtitle: Monitor keywords across X
cpa.description: Follow trending hashtags and mentions with live volume charts, sentiment cues and alerts.

ctr.title: Media Saver
ctr.subtitle: Download photos, GIFs and video
ctr.description: Save media assets complete with source attribution and engagement data for your team library.

roi.title: Spaces Explorer
roi.subtitle: Discover live and upcoming Spaces
roi.description: Filter by language, topic or host to see what's happening on X audio right now.

youtube.title: Automated Reports
youtube.subtitle: Share insights instantly
youtube.description: Generate exports, email digests and dashboards directly from the twitter web viewer.
